publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for Ieffrey Chorlton,

notesStmt.note: Foreword signed: T.M., i.e. Thomas Middleton.
The title and imprint date are xylographic.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
In this edition B1v line 5 of text ends "Companies". Quires A and parts of E and F are reimposed from STC 17875.
Identified as STC 17875 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
